hero.intro: Hi, I'm a developer based in Provo, Utah.
hero.tagline: Building sleek web experiences with React & TypeScript.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I'm a passionate web developer with a strong focus on creating user-friendly and performant web applications.
about.paragraph2: My journey in development started with a curiosity for how the internet works, and I've been hooked ever since. I enjoy turning complex ideas into simple, elegant solutions.
about.paragraph3: I'm constantly learning and exploring new technologies to expand my skillset and stay up-to-date with the latest trends in the industry.
